suggestions.proposed_text: Increase annual research output to 200+ publications in indexed journals by 2028 through the establishment of a robust Research Grant Application Support Program, which aims to secure $2M in funding for 40 grant applications. Additionally, enhance the visibility and impact of our research outputs by launching targeted postgraduate recruitment campaigns.
suggestions.rationale: The proposed strategy focuses on increasing research output by leveraging the established Research Grant Application Support Program (A3.2) and targeting new PhD and Master's enrollments through a Postgraduate Recruitment Campaign (A3.3). This dual approach ensures that both funding and talent are secured to support increased publication rates.

suggestions.proposed_text: Increase annual research output to 200+ publications in indexed journals by 2028 through the establishment of a robust Research Grant Application Support Program, aiming for 40 successful grant applications with $2M total requested funding.
suggestions.rationale: The proposed strategy now includes specific actions and KPIs that align more closely with the provided action plan items. This will allow for better tracking and measurement of progress towards the goal.

kpis.name: Annual Research Output
kpis.metric: Number of publications in indexed journals

kpis.name: Grant Application Success Rate
kpis.metric: Percentage of submitted grant applications that are successful

suggestions.proposed_text: Establish a comprehensive Career Development Center with dedicated career counselors and industry liaison officers by May 2024, while concurrently launching professional skills development programs for all undergraduates.
suggestions.rationale: This revised strategy aligns with the established action plan by focusing on both the immediate establishment of the Career Development Center and the ongoing professional skills development program. This dual approach ensures a holistic career readiness framework for students.

kpis.name: Professional Skills Workshop Participation Rate
kpis.metric: Number of workshops attended per student

suggestions.proposed_text: Establish strategic partnerships with 8 leading technology companies and multinational corporations by December 2024 to enhance industry engagement and research collaboration.
suggestions.rationale: The current strategy is broad and does not align well with the specific actions available. By focusing on a more realistic number of partners (8 instead of 15) and setting a clear timeline, the strategy can be made more actionable and measurable.

suggestions.proposed_text: Establish a collaborative research program by engaging industry partners to jointly develop and submit grant proposals worth $3M, aiming for at least 10 successful grants over the next three years.
suggestions.rationale: The proposed strategy aligns with Action A3.2 by focusing on establishing a support office for grant applications and targeting specific funding goals. This will ensure that the research initiatives are well-funded and aligned with industry needs.

suggestions.proposed_text: Establish a Center for Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning Excellence, focusing on developing a new Master's program in AI & ML.
suggestions.rationale: This proposal aligns with Action A1.4 by emphasizing the development of an AI & ML specialization and linking it to the creation of a research center.

kpis.name: Research Output
kpis.metric: Number of published papers and patents

suggestions.rationale: The proposed strategy now includes specific actions and KPIs that align more closely with the provided action items. This will help measure progress towards the goal of increasing research output.
